Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Really good food and coffee, but could be quicker for takeaways.

I had the avocado bagel and an espresso. The coffee here is above average and the Bagel is good for the price. Can recommend for a quick lunch.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Super tasty food and amazing staff, we felt very safe because they checked the covid certificate and the quality of the bagels was top notch. Thank you again üíô

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Really good. Went here every morning for a bagel and coffee. Nice staff.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Went here about 7 times, amazing owner and people, good food, fantastic prices and great vibes

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: This Bagels and Beans store serves as a remarkable place to eat breakfast, lunch, or a late snack. The staff is incredibly friendly and passionate about creating their fresh dishes and the dining environment that they create through their ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
The girl who serves here is so infectiously nice!
The food was delicious, the coffee was great and the girl serving us was one of the nicest servers ever. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great staff! The owner entertained my son a bit & made him a free baby in. Bagels were great, I had the wild mushroom croquette bagel with pickles. Well priced. My son had a peanut butter bagel, with homemade peanut butter.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: We came here every morning during our trip ! A healthy and tasty breakfast to start the day. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Bagels are fantastic but the cappuccino could be better. Prices are good and the atmosphere is young.
It would have been even nicer if they had hidden the dishing better for us sitting closest to the kitchen. But other than that, it was a really nice place!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: LOVE this place! As a New Yorker the bagels were delish the service lovely and the cappuccino yummy!  Such kind staff that remembered our faces from the first day we came. It was right near our hotel so I came here every morning for my ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Bagel and Beans is very popular. Fresh food, good quality and reasonable prices. What else do you want. This morning I had and excellent power breakfast to start my day. Very friendly staff too *****

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I frequently visit this branch of bagel & beans since its very close to my University. They have the best soy matcha latte - I literally cant get enough. The cheese cake is also pretty decent. For breakfast, I usually order their good ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Lovely lunchspot close to the University of Amsterdam! Enjoyed the food here a lot and would definitely recommend. Great English-speaking staff, so ideal for tourists.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: the bagels arent fresh so theyre always cold and chewy and hard to bite. so not worth the price

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: The place have a wide selection of bagels for all tastes. The staff was very friendly and the food was very good. The location is a nice place for a friendly meet up, but closes at 5 o'clock.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Really amazing bagels conveniently located across from uni. Get the egg salad bagel! You won't regret it ‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Got takeaway to have by the water. Our bagels were over-toasted that it was dry but staff were friendly and respected social distancing quite well. Could do with cutlery for take away. Not bad but nowadays getting take out and the amount it costs, we kinda expect some care with the quality of food

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Best matcha in Amsterdam!!! I ordered matcha at many places but this is by far the best place! I  come here almost everyday and it‚Äôs always good quality food and drinks. The service is super as well, with really polite and hardworking team ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I lived in Amsterdam for the past year but (sadly) only discovered bagels and beans within my last month there. Each B&B I have been to the staff have been lovely and the food has been excellent. Quick, fresh, affordable food. I have now ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Had an amazing chai latte and bagel! Can never find good bagels in europe but this one was superb.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Love this place! They have a great menu with good prices. I always felt at home whenever I ate here. Friendly staff and quick service. The manager is also here often and he is very friendly, talkative, and will remember you if you are a regular. I highly recommend ordering their hot chocolate and bagels with chocolate sprinkles.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: The absolute BEST place to wind down, enjoy some good company, and indulge in the best bagel eats AROUND!!!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: In these times it is nice to know that your favorite Bagels & Beans is providing you still the amazing food and, for the brief moment of picking it up, great service! On top of it all, ordering online works seamlessly.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Had a pleasant breakfast here. We ordered some salmon bagel with the creamcheese, an omelet bagel with avocado and some fresh juice with coffee. Their bagels are super delicious, quick service, affordable.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I was looking for an affordable and hearty breakfast near the Hyatt Regency Amsterdam and stumbled upon this place.  We ordered the Power Breakfast and I was pleasantly surprised with the quantity of food provided.  There was also a good ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Try the warm bagels, really worth it, nice staff, and didnt wait for too long

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Oh we love Bagels and Beans! Second visit, new location! Slightly smaller, cosier and more stairs! Both enjoyed bagels, coffees, very fresh OJ and my husband had a tasty acai smoothie! ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice lattes, possibility to have soya/almond/non diary milk. Great beagles options and cakes.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I have gone to many Bagels and Beans over the years, however, this one is my favorite. The staff are some of the best I‚Äôve encountered! ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Dog friendly place and the staff immediately offered some water for my dog. Very cozy atmosphere with good coffee and cakes. My personal favourite is their chai latte with a piece of bananabrood.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Cozy and rather big Bagels&Beans next to a University Building. They have Free WiFi and sockets to charge your electronic devices. The Staff was also very friendly and helpful. The food was tasty and the prices are on the lower end compared to similar places.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great service. love the bagel with egg and avocado and the flat white coffee was good. Open early so we could go straight to the Anna Frank house we will come back

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Lovely coffee, juices, and food! Good place to work from.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Healthier choices of food than eating french fries and a burger in the morning. I am also a fan of how they brew and serve mushroom coffee (with dried mushrooms aside the cup!).

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: We went there for the bug beagel, but unfortunately it wasn't available again. So we ended up having a Paddoburger, which was excellent and a Meatless Magic, which was just simply disappointing. Probably the worst and cheapest vegan burger ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice place a bit outside of the buzzing city centre which is super good when you just need to sip a good coffee in peace. The Tosti bagel is one of their best bagels.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Do not order the Meatless Magic bagel. The vegan meat made us nauseous and the only thing that made the bagel eatable was the mayonnaise and ketchup. The staff and atmosphere are, however, pleasant.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: It's like your regular Bagels and Beans. I kind of want to give it 4,5 stars, cause whenever I go, the staff goes on to ignore me for very long... And I don't go during peak hours. But then when I either go upstairs to order, or when they ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great service, amazing food and juices, and they have gluten free bagels and really good vegan cheese!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Maxsimum unpleasant service and root staff, awful overroasted coffee and not enough tasty food but expensive in comparison to nearby places. Uncomfortable and mood ruining place. The entire day was broken because of enormously rood communication from the owner, or whoever was in charge. Not recommended for great time spending.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Goats cheese, walnut and honey bagel is amazing. The loose tea quantity was a bit less so the taste wasnt really there.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Weirdly terrible service. Went one time, and waited a good 15 minutes for table service before deciding to up and order at the counter (the place was empty aside from two other tables and they had the same experience). ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Really nice coffees, best juices in town and all this in a very cozy atmosphere! Probably the best way to start the day, I highly recommend it, cheers

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Last time we got too little topping on our bagel, so this time we asked if we could have some more. We got more and a complementary juice! So sweet

Name: Bagels & Beans

Review Text: Good staff and decent food. Only giving a 4/5 because I asked specifically to not have any tuna or fish in the bagel tapas. It was given to me accidentally. I am a vegetarian and that killed my hunger a bit.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great smoked chicken ! We took also the omelette egg bagel was great and the juices were fresh come back for sure they open early at 08 hours

Name: Bagels & Beans

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Rushed & chaotic atmosphere, noise, staff doesn't care, and seems to be used to it. Not too clean. Male servant pushed himself through on the tiny stairs. I guess it's too tiny for any quality atmosphere.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Pretty comfy, but sometimes the servers don't notice you, and food takes a while to get prepped. Regardless,  their bagels are really tasty and always fresh.
